description: This source file implements backend APIs for device info management in a COSA Data Model context. It includes functions to get and set parameters related to firmware download status, URL, protocol, and actions like 'Download Now'. It also manages internal state and external API calls to perform these actions. The file defines functions for retrieving and setting boolean and string parameters, handles specific parameter names, and interacts with external modules for firmware download operations.

methods.name: BOOL DeviceInfo_GetParamBoolValue(ANSC_HANDLE hInsContext,char * ParamName,BOOL * pBool)
methods.description: Retrieves boolean parameters related to firmware download control such as 'FirmwareDownloadNow'.

methods.name: ULONG DeviceInfo_GetParamStringValue(ANSC_HANDLE hInsContext,char * ParamName,char * pValue,ULONG * pUlSize)
methods.description: Retrieves string parameters such as firmware download status, protocol, URL, and firmware image to download.

methods.name: BOOL DeviceInfo_SetParamBoolValue(ANSC_HANDLE hInsContext,char * ParamName,BOOL bValue)
methods.description: Sets boolean parameters for device info, particularly to initiate firmware download.

methods.name: BOOL DeviceInfo_SetParamStringValue(ANSC_HANDLE hInsContext,char * ParamName,char * pString)
methods.description: Sets string parameters for URLs and firmware image to download.
